website_summaries.verdict: An affordable choice with few extra features and some reported issues. You'll save cash in the short run, but it may not last.
pros: A basic model with an attractive design and low price
cons: Numerous owners have reported it quit working after several weeks or months of use

customer_reviews.title: The customer service NIGHTMARE before CHRISTMAS!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderfully fast boiling water. Total failure after two uses. Purchased a second unit as a gift before 1st unit failed. 2nd unit arrived DOA. Registered all my products, but no online customer service chats on website. You have to leave emails or voicemails. NO RESPONSES!!! Contacted customer service via Facebook, and they said "could not find any warranty request." Sure, just deny hearing from us. OK, Please make sure you read this and understand what your experience will be like: 1) Dead products shipped or will die shortly 2) Warranty not honored. 3) Customer service is a black hole.
customer_reviews.author: SHOPPER

customer_reviews.title: Nice design but a strong plastic taste
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this kettle for quickly boiling water at work. Unfortunately, though it does boil water quickly and the design is good, there is a strong plastic taste to the water. I tried soaking the interior with vinegar twice for 5 hours as well as washing and soaking in soap water but nothing removed the taste. I also had others taste the water to make sure that it was not just something to do with my taste buds but they all tasted the plastic as well. I am returning and purchasing an all stainless steel kettle instead.
customer_reviews.author: Scientistsas

customer_reviews.title: Great Kettle with affordable price
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this kettle for 1.5 yrs, and I'm still satisfied with it. It is easy to use, no metallic taste, and not a bad design. There is no need to spend lots of money on the kettle. The one thing I don't like is it's a bit hard to wash. But if you get the bottle brush, you will be okay. Get this one if you are looking for the affordable kettle with well-functioning product.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Soooo very glad I purchased this. The Ovente boils water quickly and shuts off when finished boiling. I read some comments about the button melting on the handle. My recommendation is to unplug the Ovente once your water has finished boiling. Which, is pretty much what I do with all of my small appliances, I never leave them plugged in. The Ovente looks very attractive on my counter.
customer_reviews.author: TanyaTop Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: Failed in Four Months
customer_reviews.text: I sent this directly to a friend. He later told me that it died after four months, and he bought another, of course different brand, cordless electric kettle. And four months is just outside the return window! They couldn't have planned "planned obsolescence" any better than that. Perfect timing! My 6-dollar similar white plastic kettle from Goodwill, an older, supposedly "less sophisticated" one with an external (not underneath the base) heating coil, lasted me much longer than that. I used it for a year or so and donated it, still working fine. And it was already used when I bought it. It makes this kettle look REALLY bad. And it makes me sad.
customer_reviews.author: VJP

customer_reviews.title: Terrible kettle that leaks and smells like plastic
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my friend living in a hotel without a kettle in her room. I thought it’s fast and easy to deliver by amazon, but who knows this kettle would leak and smell like plastic. I highly doubt that if this product passes any standard in the US. Now, I have to return it, but my friend is living in a hotel far from any ups drop off. It really causes me a lot of inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: YC

customer_reviews.title: Company bribes for good reviews
customer_reviews.text: The kettle was ok- took a while to heat up even a small amount of water... The base is a little cheap and should be weighted down but it isn't. When you lift the kettle there's a good chance the charging base will come with it (or at least move) The REAL reason I was prompted to write a review is the email I received- see picture. BEWARE the fake reviews! This company sends emails bribing buyers to give 5 stars in exchange for a water bottle. Sad really. This IS a good kettle...cheaply made but I've had worse.
customer_reviews.author: chey

customer_reviews.title: Ovente has marvelous customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I use my kettle multiple times a day and love how fast my water boils! After about a year and a half my kettle was leaking, when I poured, and I thought “oh well, I’ll live with that.” I wrote to ovente and asked if they knew of any way I could stop my counter top from becoming a large puddle each time I poured? Much to my surprise, and delight, I was informed the kettle had a two year warranty! Without hesitation, I was shipped a brand new kettle! In this day of complaints about poor customer service, I can’t praise ovente enough for their superb, above normal, client relations! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: VS Gerson

customer_reviews.title: Corroded after a month
customer_reviews.text: It's user-friendly, but the bottom is corroded after a month I purchased. I wonder if other people have that problem too?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, effective, cheerful kettle
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for the exact same item I purchased over a year ago. I use the kettle 2 or more times a day, and the previous one began to remain cooler, I think the heating element wore out, Not really a disappointment considering the price paid and the workload I forced on it. If I can get a year or more out of these kettles and pay around $20, I will continue to be very happy. They are lightweight so I am able to pour with 1 hand, easy to see the water level, bright colors are fun, no shrill whistle, I can usually hear the shut off click from a few rooms away.
customer_reviews.author: Verukka

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product to have. I always have warm clean water for my baby's bottles on hand. I boil 1.0L at night & wash it n change it for clean water in the morning. For 13$ this is a Amazing! You connect, add water, turn on n in less than 6m ur water is hot n turns off by itself!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dulce Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: My 13yr old can't get enough ramen noodles. I keep warning him to save his obsession for college when Ramen will be the only thing he can afford! After he almost burned my kitchen down using my gas range to boil water, I had to get creative. So I found this hot pot and it works fantastic. He can boil the water and the pot has an automatic shutoff / easy to read when the water is ready so I feel safe when he is cooking noodles...especially when I am not home! This is a great simple pot and I recommend it to anyone!!
customer_reviews.author: BeachBrights

customer_reviews.title: Happy enough with my first that I bought a second one
customer_reviews.text: This is my second kettle of this model, after the first one died suddenly after three years of daily use. I use it every day to make pour-over coffee and occasionally for tea. It's reliable (for a few years, anyway), simple to use, easier to clean than most kettles (just boil a kettle full of vinegar water whenever you notice mineral deposits and give a little scrub with one of those sponge-on-a-stick things for washing drinking glasses), and I love that the cord is attached to the base and I can carry the kettle wherever without dragging a cord along. The safety off feature is nice, too.
customer_reviews.author: M. Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Great Basic Kettle
customer_reviews.text: My old kettle started acting wonky and rather than getting caught without I bought this as a back up and it arrived yesterday. Unpacked it, checked for 'plastic smell' and it was definitely there. Boiled two pots of water straight out of the tap. Heated nicely, like the blue light. Love the pop top easy opening lid that opes wide enough to fill without spills. After 2nd pot, I could not smell the plastic smell. Just to be sure, left the kettle sit overnight with the lid open to air out, and today there was zero, none, nada plastic smell. So overall this is a great kettle at a low price that delivers.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gale

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Use it mostly in the winter, not much in the summer. Used it this morning, when I tried to use it this evening it no longer turns on. It lives on my counter where nothing can happen to it. It just no longer works. Tried multiple outlets all over the house even though other things are clearly working in them. I considered it great before now, but this is something that should last longer. I inherited a kettle from my dad that he had for almost a decade and lasted for me way longer.
customer_reviews.author: Mandles

customer_reviews.title: Excellent kettle
customer_reviews.text: It's a good kettle. Heats up fairly quickly. It'll stay hot for a while, which if you forget that, can be a bit of a surprise if you go to move it too soon after use. It glows up blue when heating, so you will know when it's heating up. Turns off as soon as it comes to a boil, which is handy. A bit heavy when full of water, but water is very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect...
customer_reviews.text: I love this kettle - it's a great size - not humongous the way some of them tend to be nowadays - my kitchen is small and it's not overpowering visually which I like & the blue light is fun and attractive. One complaint I DO have is the cord attached to the plug was too thick - so thick it pushed the kitchen cart out from the wall about a half inch - really awkward - so I took it to a local guy who installed a regular size safety cord in white and that's a whole lot better....why do they design products this way? I know!!!! We need more women product ENGINEERS!!! A woman would never do this....lol
customer_reviews.author: lisha

customer_reviews.title: Not the best due to misplaced on/off feature
customer_reviews.text: The kettle works fine and heats up water great. The biggest issue is that the on/off button is exactly where you’d put your thumb on the handle and where you would think the button is to open the lid so you often find yourself turning it on when that’s not what you meant to do. It’s also a bit odd shaped so when you pour it sometimes water comes out the lid when it shouldn’t. It’s a cohoe value for the low price but it’s far from perfect
customer_reviews.author: Online shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 840 days
customer_reviews.text: ... until it quit this morning. I absolutely got my money's worth. It was my first electric kettle, so I bought this cheap and cheap-looking one to try out. I used it almost daily, sometimes more than once. Next, I want one that looks better in my kitchen, maybe has some features, and hopefully lasts as long.
customer_reviews.author: J. Coderre

customer_reviews.title: Nice little "kettle"
customer_reviews.text: Great little heater for the price I paid. Can't handle heating one pot after another though. The button won't engage until it has time to cool down. I usually just use it to the min water level for my tea, which should work just fine. On the third day it started whistling at me like it was an old fashioned kettle on the stove. Made my birds go crazy. Satisfied, but took one star off for it not being able to heat back-to-back.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant because it cost so much less than most other kettles listed, but I don't know if I'll use it much (I've gone close to half a century without one, and without missing it), so I didn't want to spend much. I've only used it a couple of times, but it's way more convenient to heat water in than the microwave. A lot faster, too! And my son is eyeballing it for hot chocolate. I've had no issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: yarnjunkie

customer_reviews.title: Takes longer to heat
customer_reviews.text: Our prior Electric Kettle, made by Melitta, is almost identical in looks with this Ovente model. Our Mellitta kettle finally started leaking after over 10 years of constant use and a replacement one would have cost us over $60. So we decided to go with the Ovente model, which was the same price as our original Melitta kettle 10 years ago. It looks like 95% similar to our prior kettle except for one thing: it takes twice as long to heat water. But at the low price, we can live with it. Would have given it 5 stars if it was as fast as our Melitta, and if it lasts as long.
customer_reviews.author: Linda D

customer_reviews.title: Worked just fine until it didn't
customer_reviews.text: I liked this kettle because it was smaller and quick and in white, it was inconspicuous on my counter. As a tea drinker, I used it several times a day and it did a good job. Then today, suddenly, it just did not work. I unplugged it and looked for obvious problems. I poured out the water and refilled it and plugged it into another outlet. Nothing. This kettle was inexpensive. I bought it right before Christmas, 2019. But I would have thought it would have lasted more than 7 months. Not sure what to get it replace it. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alfalfa

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Received yesterday and gave it a test run. Filled it up with 1.7 liters of water, it took 8 minutes, got 190 degrees. This morning, I used it for 1 cup and it full boiled in 2 minutes! I'm happy with that since that's usually all I make is one cup at a time. Its very easy to use and I like I can remove it without dragging the cord around. Hopefully it will last me a long time, well, at least a year.
customer_reviews.author: Cheden

customer_reviews.title: Had it for 18 months, still working as well as it did on day one.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this jug. We've had it for 18 months now and have had no issues with it at all! Great capacity, fills a large french press plus a large mug when you fill it all the way up. Switches off consistently on it's own. Has never had a plasticy smell or taste. I kind of like the look of it too with the blue light.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: My favorite daily Kitchen appliance but did not last😢
customer_reviews.text: February 2020 Everything is just perfect with this kettle. Easy to handle, heats up fast, user-friendly. I use it everyday because I just like drinking HOT water which is very good for your body especially to protect us from COVID 19 virus. So, if you like drinking Hot water, buy this kettle. You'll be glad you did. I am very happy. September 23, 2020 Sadly, it broke down. It stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: rose

customer_reviews.title: Scratch in the metal
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my parents that they can use it in their room. When I first got it, I clean it up and made first pot of water, after i dump the water, there r a lot of spots on the bottom, also there is one look likes a metal cut. I don't know if is it normal, that's why I give 2 stars. Other than that, the water heater works fine. I dont want my parents to drink the metal though.
customer_reviews.author: Mehgan Eaker

customer_reviews.title: dies after 1 year and 6 month
customer_reviews.text: This kettle had served us very well and it was heavily used. It was great when it was working, the water boiled very fast and the surface was not hot to touch. The kettle died today and I am really debating whether I should get the same one since it's relatively cheap compare to other ones. I could put a 5 stars if it could last a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Bao

customer_reviews.title: Heats quickly - large capacity.  Great for tea addicts.
customer_reviews.text: Helps support that tea addiction. Our family drinks a lot of hot water. We drink multiple cups of tea and hot water with honey daily. This thing gets a workout and it's been holding up nicely, firing up two or three kettles of hot water a day for the past 3 months and going. In addition to looking cool when heating, the blue light is useful, when the kettle is done heating, the light goes off so you can visually see when the water is ready. Leads to a hilarious race to the kettle as we all try and get our next fix of tea.
customer_reviews.author: Taco

customer_reviews.title: Loved it, until it broke - just days after the warranty expired...
customer_reviews.text: Well, this is a hard review to write. My wife looooved hers, it was kind of life changing. And this one is the least expensive one out there (most are 2x - 4x the cost, and often smaller), and works great. But it recently started smelling like smoke a bit after 1 year and 1 week of use, so we are out of our warranty period, and this one is going in the garbage. Soooo, we loved it, but we must have gotten a bad unit. We might even buy this one again, but still trying to figure out what to replace it with.
customer_reviews.author: Atrayu

customer_reviews.title: Love my kettle!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a new electric kettle because my old one just stopped working. I chose this one for the price. I like it because it is lightweight. It boils water very quickly. I smelled plastic at first (like you see other's reviews), but I followed the instruction to clean it (basically you boil the water for a few times) and the smell is gone. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Good electric Kettle gets the job done in the office!
customer_reviews.text: I have only had it for 1 day but it works as advertised. I brought it to use at work for daily brewing of tea. It takes about 5 min. to boil 1.7 liters of water. It has a nice clean design, it's easy and comfortable to use. The only issue I had with the purchase is that it appears my item was previously opened and maybe even used once or twice. I can't confirm this, but it's appearance upon opening the box gave me this feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Jermaine

customer_reviews.title: Boils Water
customer_reviews.text: Does what it needs to; turning cold water into hot (boiling) water. There is a light blue light that shows that is in operation. Aside from the light going out, there is an audible click when it turns off. Otherwise, this pot is very quiet in operation. Even right after its turned off, the handle never gets too warm to use. My only gripe is that the opening on top is too small for my hand to get into to clean it out, but it probably doesn't need to be cleaned much.
customer_reviews.author: Joel York

customer_reviews.title: Auto shut off and cordless pot removal make it worth it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after similar product started to get tons of calcification and corrosion on bottom of heating surface, as I unfortunately forgot and left on multiple times to where all water evaporated and it was just roasting the bottom coating. Thus this is worth it (to me) for the auto-shut off alone. Like how the pot rests on a hot-plate like foundation and you then can remove it without the cord still attached. Pop up top is easy to use and I haven't had any "funny" tasting water yet, so totally satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick R.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This kettle is great! It heats very quickly and I love the blue lights it has. You can even see the water boiling, so if you don't want boiling water but almost boiling, you can turn it off at any time. A great addition to our home.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Marvelous invention! :)
customer_reviews.text: I fill it up, I put it on the base, I turn on the switch, and it turns itself off when it's finished boiling about 5 minutes later! I will never need to put a kettle on the stove again! Plus, I'm well hydrated from all the caffeine free herbal tea I'm drinking. I bring my Ovente to my desk and just refill my cup when I need to. It keeps the water hot for a few hours like a thermos too! I'm going to order one for my mother now. Update: My electric bill went through the roof! I won't take away any stars though because these things usually do suck major electricity. :(
customer_reviews.author: SBOutdoors

customer_reviews.title: Easy quick and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Solid product that makes it easy to switch to tea from coffee. Pour water in, click the button on the handle, and it does its magic. You know it’s working with a simple blue LED lighting up the water and the light turns off when the water is boiled. Good volume. Enough to set four cups of tea at once.
customer_reviews.author: Jwiz2019

customer_reviews.title: Hot! Hot! Hot!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for work. It’s perfect! Right size, quiet. Turn it in, get blue light.Heats up quickly and the lights goes off. Sometimes water is too hot! I bought it for myself, but several of my coworkers are also using it. Even got knocked off table but still working. May need second one!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Colvin

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but works
customer_reviews.text: It's cheap, the material is low quality, but I've had it for 2.5 years and it still works. Water doesn't smell or taste like plastic to me. It is a slower to boil water than the nicer, more expensive ones.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Fast and useful
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Been using it every day to make my tea now. Much hotter and more accurate than microwaving my water, much faster than using a pot on the stove. There is an audible click when the water has heated, but no chime, which I actually like. My mornings are quiet and it would likely scare the crud out of me. I also plan on bringing this with us on our vacation so we can make hot water in the hotel room - I'll be using this to boil eggs for deviled eggs in the morning too!
customer_reviews.author: Staarshadow

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had bought one sooner!
customer_reviews.text: Oh I love this thing! Super easy to use, easy to clean (I've only put water in it though), gets hot quickly and I really like that I can take it off the base to pour - so convenient!! I take this to hotels that don't have continental breakfast because I'm a BEAR when I don't have something hot when I wake up. I've used this little guy to brew water for tea, instant coffee, and any number of those little 'just add hot water' oatmeal or noodle cups. Also, I'm surprised at how light weight this is for the size - this is awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wife/Mom/Warrior Goddess

customer_reviews.title: this kettle has a lot of weird quirks or annoying features -- after a boiling a cup of water ...
customer_reviews.text: this kettle has a lot of weird quirks or annoying features -- after a boiling a cup of water (and using it), it will take a long time until the kettle cools down and allows the on-button to be pressed again. The same for cases when for example you boil a cup of water, forget about it, so you would just go for re-heating it -- not in this case -- you have to wait until everything cools down. When the kettle is full, sometimes it turns off even before reaching the boiling point. As it gets older, starts to happen more and more often.
customer_reviews.author: Yenda

customer_reviews.title: Simple and cute !
customer_reviews.text: The button malfunctioned and I received an instant replacement. Highly satisfied with customer service and definitely loved the item. Quick and simple kettle! Definitely worth it for it’s use, recommend if you need one for your home ((:
customer_reviews.author: Jahaira

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I love my little kettle! It is so helpful! I love how fast it heats up water and the water is completely boiled and stays hot just as if you had boiled it on the stove! I use it for everything now! I even take it into my classroom to work on science experiments with my 5th graders. We have been learning about the water cycle so this pot has come in handy!
customer_reviews.author: iggyberry

customer_reviews.title: Like where the start button is situated
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a home warming gift and I like it more than the more expensive one my husband purchased. The start button is on the handle unlike my own which is at the bottom but you have to raise it up instead of pushing it down and very uncomfortable trying to keep in the cradle.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Greene

customer_reviews.title: Avoid; died after 3 months of light usage.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on January 17th, 2017, and loved it. Nice and quiet, and a quick boiler. I use it to boil water for tea maybe three times a day. I turned it on today (April 26th) and it is dead as a doornail. Useless. Why can't they make kettles that last anymore? My grandmother had hers for 30 years. I guess you can't expect much for $14, but that works out at just on $5 a month for usage, as I only got three months out of it. What a joke.
customer_reviews.author: BOOKBOOK

customer_reviews.title: I liked it, but it stopped working after (almost) 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this pot on November 25, 2016 and received it on the 30th. On January 29th, 2017, my husband plugged it in and went to turn it on and there was a blue flash and then it was dead. We've tried plugging it in since then, but still nothing. It lasted almost 2 months from the day I received it. Tomorrow is the last day I have to return it, but I won't bother as it will probably cost me as much to mail it back as it did to purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Locke

customer_reviews.title: Customer service complaint dept
customer_reviews.text: Can you tell me why the Ovente boiler works intermittently? I bought this boiler and was delighted with it. Bought one for daughter too. But I never know if this kettle will make hot water or just sit there cold no hot water. I bought it December 2015 and it's been used every day until this summer. I make food for hummingbirds and use boiling water to melt the sugar. I fill four quart feeders every day. I am also a tea drinker. I am so disappointed in the Ovente boiler . I was going to order another Ovente but if they only last a little over a year----
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Ward

customer_reviews.title: A must have.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. No more trying to boil water on stove. Just fill it, press start go get your tea ready and BANG, it's ready and hot. Only 1 problem is for the first few times I used it there was a plastic taste and smell but it went away. Just give it a few test runs at first.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Wann Jr

customer_reviews.title: Works well and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this almost daily for over a month now, and it is still going strong. It's not the fastest, but for me it's not a problem because I just set it and do other things for a few minutes until it is done. It has a nice blue light that lets you know it's working. Other than that it is pretty basic but does the job for a very low price.
customer_reviews.author: David Alexander

customer_reviews.title: No temperature control, ON or OFF, Boiling or NOT boiling
customer_reviews.text: Heater works well if you need to boil water. There is no control of temperature, it's a simple on or off. The great part is that it heats up fast, and if you left it on, it turns off automatically to be safe Also make sure you use filtered or purified water because other minerals, it will get cloudy.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleyoung

customer_reviews.title: Boils water quickly!
customer_reviews.text: Good electric tea kettle for brewing tea without having to turn on your burner. Boils water really quickly and shuts off automatically. Don’t like that the water will collect on the bottom and stain after you empty all the water out. I’m not sure if it’s calcium deposits or something else but I’m not a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia09

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure why it was near impossible to find an electric tea kettle in Hawaii but when I found this for sale on Amazon, I jumped to purchase it. Not only is this super cheap, it works remarkably better than I expected. This was a great purchase and I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: nalokaloka

customer_reviews.title: It is exactly what i was expecting
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a simple electric kettle that shut itself off after boiling water . which is exactly what i bought .i did not have any expectations beyond that so i was not disappointed.Anecdotally this is the same exact electric kettle i have seen in every home and hotel room in Israel.The only difference,it came with an american plug for a US Electrical Outlet
customer_reviews.author: N Gross

customer_reviews.title: About 3 years use before having to replace.
customer_reviews.text: Got this about 3 years ago, works great, but every time I use it, the bottom gets a buildup of something. I've tried boiling coke, vinegar, plastic scrub, plastic brush. It immediately comes back. Even when I empty it between uses. But, 3 years for the cost isn't bad.
customer_reviews.author: Kikiblue

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home or office
customer_reviews.text: Great convenience in the office for tea in a small space. Holds good amount of water. Heats quickly. Blue light makes it easy to see when the heat is on or off.
customer_reviews.author: West Virginia Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great pot! Give it some time before writing reviews
customer_reviews.text: it boils water very quickly, very convenient and efficient. This turned out to be a great find! It was one of the least expensive of all similar items. Yes, it has some odors when boiling at the beginning, for about 10 uses, BUT there's no smell after that. Yes, got some stain ? or discoloration on the inside bottom at first, BUT it cleared after several uses. Before ordering I was skeptical about the quality of this item, read and saw lots of reviews and posted photos, expecting some defects and poor quality. I strongly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I really love this kettle. I know it’s silly, after all, you can heat up a cup of water in the microwave quicker than waiting for the kettle to heat up. But there’s something about it that just makes the whole tea experience better. I like the cordless ability with the plug being attached to the base and being able to wrap the cord up in the base. It’s easy to seat as well. Works perfectly. Exactly what I was looking for and just purchased a second one for my mom.
customer_reviews.author: MonaLisa

customer_reviews.title: DOESNT WORK
customer_reviews.text: RECEIVED ITEM AND SINCE I WORK CRAZY HOURS I HAD NOT HAD A CHANCE TO TRY IT OUT. MY HUSBAND HAD ALSO THROWN THE BOX OUT. HE TRIED TO GET IT READY FOR ME AND IT DOES NOT WORK AT ALL, NO POWER OR ANYTHING. I WOULD LIKE TO RETURN IT BUT I DONT HAVE THE BOX
customer_reviews.author: Trish W

customer_reviews.title: Works fine.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a white kettle and it works fine. Only issue is that if you pick it up before it's actually hit the final boil point, it doesn't automatically turn off. The base will still be on when you put it down, so just be mindful if you have small kids around. It only for a minute or so, but still not a good issue.
customer_reviews.author: craftysluth

customer_reviews.title: Good for a month, then lid warped and it spills all over.
customer_reviews.text: This product worked well for just over a month. Now the lid has begun to warp, even after following all instructions (ie water level has been met) etc. So now, when I pour the water after it heats, water pours not only from the spout but also from the rim surrounding the lid, making a mess of my counter top every time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Value, ...gets the job done~
customer_reviews.text: I knew that this would not be that fastest of electric kettles in heating water, but I am still happy overall with it. The price was right, and it's a competent performer, based on those factors. Lower wattage, slower boiling times, ...higher wattage, will probably cost more, and reduce boiling times. That's about the only issue I can point out.
customer_reviews.author: Ron  Dijcks

customer_reviews.title: Very useful and Works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I like having tea in my room and I never feel like going down to the kitchen, making tea, and bringing it back upstairs. This will be nice to keep on my desk. It got hot in about 2(maybe 3, I wasn’t counting) minutes. Then it switched off automatically. The tea pot is very cute. The only thing I wish was different is that the cord could stand to be longer. It is about two feel long and if it had just another foot it would be a bit more useful.
customer_reviews.author: Kira

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT, just do not overfill!
customer_reviews.text: Safety feature will keep it from heating up if you overfill it. Which I did the second time I used it. Safety features that work I like. It is just a small thing to know. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: N. Basile

customer_reviews.title: Cautious teacher
customer_reviews.text: I'm a high school teacher who loves tea. Keeping my students safe is always job one, so I needed a way to boil water that was quick, simple, and totally safe. This gets the job done. The plastic never gets hot, the pot is easy to keep locked up in my large metal desk drawer (nothing else goes in there), and I never worry about a fire, overheating or electrical hazard. Easy.
customer_reviews.author: Optimistic skeptic

customer_reviews.title: For the price its pretty good! I would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: It's ok, but does the job. For the price its pretty good! I would buy it again. inside the coil is hidden so that's great! The outer plastic helps to keep little fingers from getting burned unlike the stainless steel kettles. The numbers that show the liquid level come off very fast, but I could care less about that. After 6 months the on button started to work funky or turn off on its own sometimes. If not for that last issue I'd give it 4.5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Nas

customer_reviews.title: a very useful item, has stood up to daily use for ...
customer_reviews.text: a very useful item, has stood up to daily use for about 6 months now, it's very nice. No more red hot mugs from the microwave and it heats very quickly. 11/24/2018 And still later on it continues to give fine service on demand. A worthy product. I even use it to get hot water into large pots for boiling potatoes or pasta or something like that. It's quicker and it works. I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Purchased Twice, Broken Twice After Weekly Use
customer_reviews.text: This product lasts for about 12-14 months and then breaks. We purchased two. It was cheap so when the first one broke, we figured it was a fluke and bought another one. The second one we purchased also broke within 12-14 months. I will not be purchasing a third. This is a great, cheap hot water heater that runs well. In both cases, the water heater began leaking from the bottom of the unit after a about one year of daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Great company
customer_reviews.text: Update 6/25/18: Highly recommend this product. They actually sent me the glass one as a replacement. Still going strong almost 2.5 years later. When this one dies, I will buy this again! Update 4/11/16: After talking to customer service, they will be sending a new one. Upping to 3 stars (for customer service) till I can make a solid review on the replacement unit. Original review 3/2016: Loved it, till it broke less than 2 months after receiving it. Turned it on and it started smoking and electrical burning smell filled my apartment. Wouldn't recommend to anyone that values their stuff not starting on fire.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: looks nice and unobtrusive on the counter
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Heats well, looks nice and unobtrusive on the counter. BUT... after the first week the pop button lid opener won't open and the spout leaks on the side. Grrrrrrrrr. Threw away the boxes so can't return. I'll continue to use it but may look for a replacement. I have been shopping with Amazon for more than 25 years, joined Prime at it's inception, am blessed with more cardboard boxes than I could ever imagine having (this is not a complaint, as no one gives you a box anymore when you buy something) and this is the first time I've received a faulty product.
customer_reviews.author: davina

customer_reviews.title: Works well and quick
customer_reviews.text: Love this! We drink a lot of tea and hot cocoa and this has been a great product. Keeps water warm for a long time, which is nice since we constantly forget that we had water warming. Works well, easy to clean, honestly pretty quiet, and works quickly. Have had it for a few months now and no problems whatsoever. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Efficient.
customer_reviews.text: I have got tea almost every day day, thru-our the day. This makes it so convenient to use for my usual green tea, but also when I want a different herbal tea. Don’t have to watch the stove to make sure water doesn’t boil over or if you get called away you don’t have to worry about any mishaps. Looks nice on the counter and doesn’t take up alot if space.
customer_reviews.author: Judi A

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep in the office kitchen. It is perfect for it--inexpensive, simple, and does the job well. I'm giving it 4 stars instead of 5 because it does take a while to heat up the water. It has auto off so it's not a big deal, but more expensive models like the one I have at home do work faster.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Boils quickly but the water taste like plastic
customer_reviews.text: The kettle arrived very quickly was very pleased with that b heats up quickly just like an electric kettle should do. The one negative is the boiled water taste like plastic will have to buy another kettle for can't stand the taste this one gives
customer_reviews.author: Jolly Grub

customer_reviews.title: Electric kettle works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: The extension cord is heavy duty, so I like its durability, but if you intend to leave it on your counter, you'll find it is bulky and hard to keep out of the way. It works fantastic however, the buttons are solid and will last a while I think (I make iced tea all the time so this has been used a lot since my purchase) - it comes to boil rapidly; turns off if you want to stop it early, and has a lighted view window so you can see when it's just about to boil.
customer_reviews.author: Baggs

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: It just like any other electric kettle, it will automatically shut off when the water is boiled. It's fast compare to boil the water on the stove but still take too long compare to other electric kettle with this little amount of water.
customer_reviews.author: Mll1021

customer_reviews.title: Makes me hot water for tea and coffee
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient to use. Can leave it at home to get hot water on the fly, or you can take it to your office that does not have a source of clean hot water. Good price point as well.
customer_reviews.author: Salvador Garza

customer_reviews.title: Works well while it actually works
customer_reviews.text: My roommate in college had an electric tea kettle that she still uses and it’s been almost 15 years! I looked forward to that kind of longevity. Unfortunately, this will not give you that kind of longevity. It lasted a solid 2.5 years before it pooped out. If I could go back, I would purchase a more expensive one that will hopefully last longer. Momma needs her tea in the morning!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsi Adams

customer_reviews.title: Only last 2 years
customer_reviews.text: I bought this almost exactly 2 years ago, and now it wont work. I have tried everything and it just has died. Its a great kettle when it works, but I guess it only has a 2 year life span, so now I am forced to look for another one.
customer_reviews.author: mclachli

customer_reviews.title: Not faster boiling than stove as stated.
customer_reviews.text: It is nice that it doesn't heat up the whole kitchen heating water but DOES NOT heat it faster. I did a side by side test and it actually took ONE minute longer to boil the same amount of water than my stove. My stove is old so I am probably using less electricity. In the ad on amazon it says BPA free on the bit of plastic where you can view the water but no where on the box does it say that, nor in the directions. I hope that is true.
customer_reviews.author: ted bear

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: heats water super fast. i use it in my rv for coffee, noodles, oatmeal etc. Dont waste propane heating on the stove, or the heat in the camper, this is a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Y.

customer_reviews.title: Intermittent issues with turning on after 8 months
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this kettle but after 8 months of use, it began having issues with turning on. I've been giving it longer cool down periods and have been dumping and refilling the water with every use while also making sure to not fill it much past the minimum volume mark. When it worked, I was a huge fan but now it's been so unreliable that it makes me wish I had bought another model in the first place. Edit: I contacted the sellers and they're sending me a new one with the warranty!
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Yen

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Things I like: -> It looks nice -> It heats water quickly -> Now I can have tea every morning -> The kettle comes out of the base so you can clean/carry it somewhere else. Very portable. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: It does what you expect a electric teakettle to do !I
customer_reviews.text: It was used several times every day to make coffee and get a small amount of hot water without waiting for it from the water tank. I originally wrote a poor review . as I didn't know how much my caretakers had used it . I now have a new one just like it.!!
customer_reviews.author: Geddes Kujaneck

customer_reviews.title: Best Cordless Elecric teakettle
customer_reviews.text: It is the best electric teakettle. I have only had for a few days. Although, if you have larger than a size 6 glove size hand, you will not be able to put your hand inside to clean it. You will have to use a sponge on the end of a handle or the like. I purchased this for my office to make my morning cereal and hot chocolate. It is just as described The pot is separate from the base so when you pick up the pot, no worries with the cord and base. It is a 3 prong cord - probably for safety reasons. I recommend and will be purchasing one for home.
customer_reviews.author: Tressa

customer_reviews.title: diear one stopped working after nine months. This is ...
customer_reviews.text: diear one stopped working after nine months. This is my secont I bought in april and it just stopped working after four months! I have given up on this product. Any way to get it working?.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Suddenly Stopped Working!
customer_reviews.text: Until yesterday I would have given this kettle a solid five stars, but then it suddenly stopped working! It still gets three stars because I like the design and small footprint on the counter (we're in a NYC apartment and counter space is a precious commodity), and it heated up very quickly. The soft blue light was great, too, because at a glance I could tell if it was still heating up. Even a cheap kettle I would expect to last at least a year; but this one, after not even being subjected to daily use, has quit after less than 9 months. I think we're going back to the classic stove top whistler kettle.
customer_reviews.author: P. Thomsen

customer_reviews.title: Noooooope.
customer_reviews.text: No matter how many times or how thoroughly I was this there is still always something floating in the water after heating it. Looks like caulk or something almost. Either way it's gross and this went into the garbage
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Stop working after 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one from Amazon in March 15. Yesterday (7/26) my wife told me that this kettle stop working suddenly. We tried to put in different outlet, it does not work. Is there any way I can repair it? Many thanks. This is solved by refresh outlet switch. It is not kettle issue. Yesterday (10/15) kettle stopped work without any sign. I assume it was outlet issue again. I moved kettle to upstair outlet, it did not work. what can I do? any support to check / repair it? Many thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Hua Lin

customer_reviews.title: bought to have at work
customer_reviews.text: bought this because it was inexpensive. something to have at work to make instant coffee and ramen for lunch and avoid paying ridiculous prices at the cafeteria where i work for weak house coffee and mediocre food.
customer_reviews.author: BINOBINOBINO

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this kettle in January of this year. It was always used and maintained according to instructions. It worked perfectly for around 6 months. Unfortunately after that it started malfunctioning. Sometimes it worked, sometimes it did not. It completely stopped working after around 7 months. Maybe the kettle I received was a lemon, maybe not, but I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I bought this because I was recovering from surgery and did not want to go around the gas stove. It was perfect. I love the speed that it heats up and that I can just put the loose tea in and there is a built in strainer. Great modern tea pot.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I'm absolutely obsessed with this product and even bought one for my car from another manufacturer (because of course it needs to match). But if you've never had one of these, these are awesome! I like to make instant coffee, tea and cuppa soup with mine. So in that way -it's an absolutely epic gift for a college student or a first apartment!
customer_reviews.author: V~

customer_reviews.title: Why has the heating element burned out
customer_reviews.text: We bought this in November 2017 - the heating element went out today August 13th 2018. Is this the life time of the element?
customer_reviews.author: sejt

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price for this quick-heating kettle!
customer_reviews.text: Love the price on this! Works great to heat large amounts of water that you might need for cocoa, tea, etc. It heats quickly and the blue-light indicator is helpful to know when the water is ready. Also, it keeps water hot for a long time. I tested it out and still kept water hot for about 30 minutes (couldn't tell how much longer, as it got used after that). My only nitpick, and it could be user error, but sometimes I have a hard time opening the lid. Maybe I need to hold it down longer? Anyway, had it for several weeks and really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Jill-of-All-Trades Mistress-of-None

customer_reviews.title: Good product but stopped heating after almost a year.
customer_reviews.text: Parents use it for hot water for their morning tea and loved it. After almost a year it stopped heating the water. The unit was replaced under the warranty. Now 11 months in, the replacement unit no longer heats the water. I wonder if it just dies after about a year or if we got 2 lemons in a row. I saw one review where the user had theirs for 4 years. It looks great, has good features, just doesn't seem reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Armen Arisian

customer_reviews.title: Strong plastic smell even after 10 usages
customer_reviews.text: Got this water kettle for about a month for now. It works as a normal water kettle. However, even after using it for more than 10 times, the water it boiled still has a strong plastic smell. We've tried to clean it thoroughly and wash it with running water. But they don't help. I'd not recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Joess

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and Durable
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, heats water quickly and has a blue light the shuts off to signify when it is done heating.
customer_reviews.author: Da'Lisha Kimble

customer_reviews.title: Time Does Matter
customer_reviews.text: I do like the product. It heats the water up like it should. However, it doesn't retain the heat. I took the heated pot to my desk to use for hot tea. The second cup, the water was lukewarm. I'm not happy about that. It turns off after it heats so to keep it hot, I have to keep reheating the water. Sigh...
customer_reviews.author: V. Richards

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Very good little kettle for the price. It's much larger than I thought it would be, but it doesn't take up a lot of counter space. Something every college student should have. Coffee, tea, cocoa, ramen, oatmeal, instant mashed potatoes. Very handy and quick. The auto shutoff is a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: k'la

product_meta.title: Ovente Electric Hot Water Kettle 1.7 Liter with LED Light, 1100 Watt BPA-Free Portable Tea Maker Fast Heating Element with Auto Shut-Off and Boil Dry Protection, Brew Coffee & Beverage, White KP72W
product_meta.description:
Color:WhitePurifies Water to the Last Drop
Did you know that most bottled waters sold in the supermarkets are reclaimed and reprocessed tap water? They have been heavily filtered to change the taste, and they are packaged in bottles that might contain BPA, posing a danger of plastic chemicals leaching into the water. Not to mention they are sold at prices that’s 3000 times higher than tap water! That’s a hefty sum of money for something that’s not too far from the water you get from your faucet. With this Ovente’s KP72 Electric Kettle Series, you’d be able to purify your drinking water to its safest state. It runs on 1100W (120V) that boils water at 160 ℉, effectively killing all pathogens and bacteria present in it.

Uncomplicated Operation and Cleanup
This kettle is crafted with a secure locking lid that flips back with just one push of a button! This button stays cool along with its cool touch handle. What’s more, you can remove its spout filter for an out-and-out clean! Simply mix 3 tablespoons of vinegar or lemon with water then allow it to boil. Let it sit for a minimum of five more hours and dry afterwards. Storing this 1.7L kettle is easy as well: The 30-inch cord wraps neatly to its base.

Key Features
- 1.7L
- 1100W
- BPA-free
- Stainless Steel Interior
- Concealed Heating Element
- Easy-to-Clean Removable Filter
- LED indicator light
- Automatic shut-off and boil-dry protection
- Stay-cool handle and button
- Measurements: 8.5 x 6.7 x 9.4 inches
NOTE: The electric kettle might reach the boiling point faster at higher altitudes due to the fluctuation of temperature. Hence, the kettle might not shut off on its own.

CAUTION: KETTLE BODY MIGHT GET EXTREMELY HOT DURING OPERATION. PLEASE BE EXTRA CAREFUL AND USE THE COOL-TOUCH HANDLE TO AVOID BURNS.
feature_bullets: BOILS WATER IN A FLASH – This electric kettle operates on 1100W (120V) and boils a full 1.7L pot of water in less than 6 minutes! It is 50% more efficient than traditional stovetops in reducing your daily electricity use.

CLEANEST DRINKING WATER – Save yourself from the health-associated risks of ingesting harmful chemicals that come from a kettle’s loose BPA particles. This fast-heating cordless boiler is BPA-free! You’ll be sure that what you’ll get is a clean drinking water that’s safe for you and your kids.

FIRE SAFETY FEATURE – This one is equipped with auto shut-off feature and boil-dry protection technology: It shuts off on its own when the pot has reached its boiling temperature and switches off the heating element when there is no water in the kettle.

DURABILITY WITH STYLE – The Ovente cordless kettles are famous for their durability and style. Not only does it look great with its trendy colors, it is designed to last long too! It has a concealed heating element that extends your kettle’s life, compared with non-concealed ones that deteriorate faster.

2-YEAR WARRANTY on Domestic (USA) Repairs and Replacements on workmanship and materials from date of purchase from authorized reseller. International inquiries please contact manufacturer customer service directly for better assistance.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars6,659 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
